game.title: The Lost Sword
game.objective: Find the lost sword and return it to the king
game.description: A powerful sword, said to have the ability to bring great fortune and prosperity, has been lost in the Forest of Shadows. The king has offered a generous reward for its return. Can you find the lost sword and bring it back to the king?

task.objective: Meet the wizard in the village
task.description: The wizard in the village possesses knowledge about the location of the lost sword. Go to the village and find the wizard to learn more about the quest.

task.objective: Retrieve the map from the ancient temple
task.description: The wizard tells you that an ancient map, hidden in a temple, holds the key to finding the lost sword. Journey to the temple and retrieve the map.
Using the map, navigate through the treacherous Forest of Shadows to uncover the location of the lost sword.
The lost sword is guarded by a fearsome monster. Defeat the monster to claim the sword.

task.objective: Return the sword to King Arthur
task.description: Return the lost sword to King Arthur in the royal palace and claim your reward.
